name: Smesh Braus
description:
Right and left arrows to move

1 to punch

2 to kick

3 to parry

only kicks can be parried

punch are swift, but short ranged

kicks are slow, but give much more combo score

parring kicks resets opponent combo score

The more combo scores you have, the more your attacks push the ennemy

When you get hurt, you are stunned for 1/3 of a second and can't input

anything, then, your character continues being ejected, but you can stop this

by pressing the opposite arrow key.

Have fun with this low effort IA (its moves are fully randomized :P).
